bug.author: mmingay
bug.description:
First of all thanks for building this great library. I just wanted to let you know that the documentation at <denchmark-link:https://selene.flatironinstitute.org/>https://selene.flatironinstitute.org/</denchmark-link> seems to have some formatting issues. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57153190/96904124-887e1880-144b-11eb-8917-c5c1bae6f1dd.png></denchmark-link>
Matt

comments.comment: Oh, no! Thanks very much for raising this issue, I'll look into this ASAP...
